title: 'I'm lost!' Ryan James is mocked after forgetting the Welcome to Country before the NRL Grand Final
text:
Ryan James has been mocked online after he forgot his words during the Welcome to Country before the NRL Grand Final.

The indigenous Gold Coast Titans star forgot his lines on stage in front of a sold-out crowd at ANZ Stadium in Sydney.

The 28-year-old thanked the traditional custodians of the land, before he got stuck midway through his speech.

Ryan James (pictured) forgot the words to the Welcome to Country at the NRL Grand Final

'As a game we stand together, side by side … I’m lost,' James said.

The crowd laughed and let out a cheer as James stood smiling at the microphone, before Natalie Bassingthwaighte cut him off to sing the national anthem.

Fans took to Twitter to laugh at James' misfortune.

Many compared James' blunder to the Gold Coast Titans season, where they finished with the wooden spoon.
description: Ryan James has been mocked online after he forgot the words to the Welcome to Country before the NRL Grand Final.
authors: Jackson Barron For Daily Mail Australia
